'A' -> 000000101
'C' -> 00000000100
'D' -> 000000000010
'E' -> 00000000011
'I' -> 00000001001
'L' -> 00000001000
'M' -> 0000000011
'N' -> 000000100
'O' -> 00000000101
'P' -> 000000011
'S' -> 00000000010
'T' -> 0000000101
'U' -> 0000000000011
'V' -> 0000000000010
' ' -> 11
'a' -> 10000
'b' -> 00000101
'c' -> 00011
'd' -> 000101
'e' -> 101
'f' -> 00000011
'g' -> 0000011
'h' -> 00000100
'i' -> 1001
'j' -> 000000000000
',' -> 000000000011
'l' -> 0011
'm' -> 00101
'.' -> 000011
'n' -> 01000
'o' -> 00100
'p' -> 000100
'q' -> 0000100
'r' -> 01001
's' -> 011
't' -> 0101
'u' -> 10001
'v' -> 0000101
